# EASI - Evaluative Artificial Speech Intelligence

> EASI transforms 5+ hours of speech-language evaluation into 15-30 minutes using computational linguistics and speech processing technology.

## Key Facts

- Transforms 5+ hours of evaluation into 15-30 minutes
- 98-99% transcription accuracy
- Automatic speaker diarization (separates adult from child speech)
- IPA transcription included
- Calculates MLU, IPSYN, NDW, PCC, VOT, Intelligibility
- HIPAA and FERPA compliant
- NSF SBIR Phase II funded (Award #2133148)
- Built by practicing speech-language pathologists
- $199/year includes 10 evaluations + unlimited ChatSLP access
- Distributed exclusively through Northern Speech Services

## ChatSLP

ChatSLP is EASI's clinical reasoning partnerâ€”a HIPAA-compliant consultation system that helps SLPs cross-check findings, draft reports, and get evidence-based intervention suggestions. Unlike ChatGPT, ChatSLP is safe for real patient data.

## Why Not ChatGPT?

SLPs cannot use ChatGPT for evaluations: no BAA (HIPAA violation), cannot process audio, cannot separate speakers, cannot calculate clinical metrics, risks professional license. EASI provides all of this with healthcare-grade security.
